__e: Why can't Claude come up with an insane bar snack
Cause if you don't, Claude, we've nothing left to say to each other.
Claude, I won't apologize for doing what is right and what I was asked to do by my boss.
Actually, by going to London, you found the best way to fight on and get away from Claude and I.
There is nothing between Claude and me, and what little there was... it's long in the past.
- You're not my Claude anymore and it's too late to change.
Best moment of that idiot's life was getting his ass kicked by Jean Claude Van Damme. Stop.

I'll hoist a beer while you get dinner started and then when our bellies are full and you've done the dishes, we will adjourn to the Winnebago where Mr. Jean-Claude Van Damme, the Muscles from Brussels, will ply his trade against the forces of evil.
This is the first Lamborghini where you don't need to have the body of... Jean Claude Van Damme to drive it.
